price: Kuma lalle haƙĩƙa, Mun bai wa Mũsã Littafi,* sabõda haka kada ka kasance a cikin shakka daga haɗuwa da shi. Kuma Mun sanya shi ya zama shiriya ga Banĩ Isrã'ĩla.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ فَلَا تَكُن فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
footnotes: * Ba Alƙur'ãni ne farkon Littãfin sama ba kuma bã Muhammadu ne farkon Manzannin Allah ba, Mun bai wa Mũsã Attaura, mutãnensa sun yi aiki da ita, sun ɗaukaka kamar yadda ake neman Musulmi su yi aiki da Alƙur'ãni su ɗaukaka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba falā takun fī mir'yatin min liqāihi wajaʿalnāhu hudan libanī is'rāīla
